item.title: Bread & Fred coming to PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, and Xbox One on February 24
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for Switch and PC.

Publisher Infogrames and developer Sand Castles Studios will release cooperative platformer Bread & Fred for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on February 24 for $14.99, the companies announced.

Bread & Fred first launched for PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG on May 23, 2023, followed by Switch on May 23, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Infogrames:

About

Bread & Fred is a challenging cooperative platformer where two players must cooperate to jump and climb to the top of a snowy mountain. Play as both Bread and Fred in their exasperating and sometimes maddening climb that requires precision with every jump. Each time you land you’ll be closer to the peak and one step closer to mastering the platforming, but your fall down the mountain will be even farther.

Key Features

  • Swing to Reach Distant Platforms – Bread and Fred are attached to each other. That means you don’t only fall together, but you can make good use of momentum to swing and propel each other beyond what any single penguin could have ever jumped. Make sure one of you anchors down to the ground or you’ll both fall!
  • Hold On to Walls As Long As You Can – The penguins’ little hands aren’t very good, but you can hang on a wall with your partner for a few seconds to swing them around and overcome the next obstacle. Be careful though. These penguins are chubby so you can’t hold on long. Act fast!
  • Single-Player Mode – Can’t find your penguin buddy? Strap your rope to Jeff (a rock!) and use it instead! The climb will all be up to you and your skill, but that also means you have no one to blame when you fall…

Legends say that with these skills, a few penguin heroes have managed to reach the top. Will you be one of them?

Each fall will hurt, but try to learn and laugh through it. Think carefully about each jump and master the penguin skills to reach the summit.

For the craziest climbers, Bread & Fred includes a speedrun mode so you can compete and be crowned the best penguins on the planet.

The mountain awaits you. Complete your mission. Cooperate with each other and you will be able to go far up the mountain. Just try not to fall (too much). Good luck!!

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation and Xbox Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/bread-fred-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-ps4-and-xbox-one-on-february-24
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: ROMEO IS A DEAD MAN launch trailer
item.content:encoded:
Grasshopper Manufacture has released the launch trailer for “ultra-violent science-fiction” action game ROMEO IS A DEAD MAN .

Here is an overview of the game, via Grasshopper Manufacture:

About

Take control of the protagonist Romeo Stargazer in this third person single-player action adventure, split into various chapters. His story is both unpredictable and littered with intense battles, interspersed with side missions to suit the player’s pace.

Fight Blood With Blood

Romeo switches between swords and guns to fight. Wipe out the waves of enemies that stand in your path to give birth to a new kind of bloody action, and take down the fearsome space-time criminals that await. Absorb the blood of your enemies to unleash Romeo’s special attack: Bloody Summer, capable of turning any situation around. Romeo’s various weapons can be strengthened and altered as the story moves forward as he takes on even stronger enemies.

A Story That Transcends Space-Time

This game’s story starts with space-time itself being shattered by a certain incident. Romeo, too, on the brink of life and death finds himself revived by a new kind of super technology. Thus he is recruited for the FBI’s Space-Time Police as a special agent, and wanders the cosmos in search of criminals who’ve taken advantage of the situation at hand in an attempt to bring justice back to the universe. At the same time, he looks for clues concerning his missing girlfriend Juliet, and quickly comes to find both her disappearance and the destruction of space may be more linked than he thought. Donning the mask called Deadgear, what awaits Romeo at the edges of space-time?

ROMEO IS A DEAD MAN is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on February 11.

Watch the trailer below.

Launch Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/romeo-is-a-dead-man-launch-trailer

item.title: State of Play set for February 12 featuring over an hour of updates
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5

News, gameplay updates, and announcements from game studios across the globe.

Sony Interactive Entertainment will host a State of Play on February 12 at 2:00 p.m. PT / 5:00 p.m. ET, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube (English, English Subtitles, Japanese), Twitch, and TikTok.

The broadcast, which will run for over 60 minutes, will feature “news, gameplay updates, and announcements from game studios across the globe,” including “eye-catching third-party and indie games headed to PlayStation 5, along with the latest from teams at PlayStation Studios.”



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/state-of-play-set-for-february-12-featuring-over-an-hour-of-updates
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: CyberConnect2 to announce 30th anniversary game project on February 16
item.content:encoded:
A culmination of CyberConnect2's cultivated technology, strength, and courage.

CyberConnect2 will announce a new game project in commemoration of its 30th anniversary on February 16 at 20:09 JST, the company teased.

According to CyberConnect2 CEO Hiroshi Matsuyama, it will be a “completely new game title” that serves as a “culmination of the technology, strength, and courage [CyberConnect2] has cultivated thus far.”

Stay tuned.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/cyberconnect2-to-announce-30th-anniversary-game-project-on-february-16
